Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stetson/Randolph
ShortDescription: NB  #6 Jackson Park Exp buses are rrtd via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound  #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route (take layover on Wacker between Columbus and Michigan) due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Beverly/97th
ShortDescription: Southbound X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 103rd and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Beverly/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 103rd and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Beverly/79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Southbound  #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Washington,  Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near North Blvd /Forest Park.

Headline: Orange Line Trains bypassing Western Station
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#49 Western buses

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
